entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 3:46 PM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the morning. High 7. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:46 PM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
